text: Roughly ½ Irish electricity comes from gas, ¼ from coal and peat. 27% of electrical carbon emissions come from gas, 54% from coal and peat.    Replacing coal and peat with gas  should reduce carbon from electricity by ⅓. Replacing it with renewables reduces it by 55%.
